name: Liestervannia
description:
Hello Everyone this is my first game, I made for the @CommunityGameJam

My first game jam and also my first game.

The game control are:

You can either use:

A -> Left

D -> Right

W -> Jump

OR

Left, Right, Up Arrow

To Shoot you use the Left Button Mouse.

The game resolution is 1920px width and 1080px Height.
